promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic mythical bull steel-type pokemon wearing a ornate crown. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or bull. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Ironcrownus, a a gigantic mythical bull steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Rusty Claws, Legend Ceremony. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bull", "steel" or "Ironcrownus". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, bull-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This colossal bovine titan, encased in metallic armor, rules desert landscapes. It brandishes Rusty Claws and conducts a Legend Ceremony.
